summary: Provides core components for building and operating Stable Diffusion text‑to‑image models, including a diffusion engine that handles data encoding/decoding, optimizer setup, EMA, logging, and sample generation, as well as a base diffusion model class that manages network execution, conditioning preparation, checkpoint tracking, and training initialization. Supports both standard and Megatron‑based distributed training.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to efficiently train, scale, and deploy Stable Diffusion models for generating images from textual prompts, with built‑in support for large‑scale distributed environments.
